reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shirt's style versatile, with one mentioning it can be dressed up or down, and they appreciate its amazing fit and high-end feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go-To Brand!!! Affordable, Comfy, and So Chic!
items.body: I am one of Dokotoo‚Äôs biggest fans! Every single piece of clothing I‚Äôve gotten from them has been amazing quality; everything fits beautifully and feels incredible. When you find a brand this good, you stick with them‚Ä¶ and this is definitely one of those brands. I needed a top to wear with a pair of paperbag-style pants and picked up this one. I read the reviews recommending to size up, and I‚Äôm so glad I did, the fit was perfect. I wear a medium and I am 5'3" and 163 pounds. The material is a lightweight sweater knit that‚Äôs sooo soft and not see-through at all. It totally finished off my outfit, and I was comfortable all day. Honestly, it felt like wearing pajamas! I got so many compliments when I wore it. Highly recommend this top and the brand in general. I‚Äôm obsessed‚Ä¶ and so is my wallet! üòÇ Read more
items.author: Ms. Frugjee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Shirt!
items.body: So cute! I got a medium and was a perfect fit. The shirt is soft, has a nice stretch, not see through, and a good length. I am 5'6" 161 lbs for reference. Read more
items.author: Victoria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering top: A+
items.body: Super cute top and perfect for fall temps! The fabric is extremely soft and has a great weight to keep you cozy but not too hot. The puffy shoulders translate even better once you‚Äôve received it and able to try it on for size. I also love that the back is a bit longer than the front as well. The sizing runs true-to-size ‚Äî or if anything, slightly larger ‚Äî which is what I hoped for. I like my tops to run a tad big, so all is not lost if it ends up in the dryer. I‚Äôm 5ft 6‚Äù and 130lbs and chose a large; but also certain a medium would fit fine. I‚Äôm want a couple more in a few other colors, because I can tell this will be one of my favorite go-to staples (especially because the flattering shape will dress-up just fine for work, and be darling with shorts or a casual mini skirt for running errands. Read more
items.author: Delighted

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars On-trend Prep!
items.body: I feel sophisticated, studious and stylish-prep when I wear this top. The cream primary color is subtly vibrant and I feel like the navy can look black if worn with other black attire. True to size in fit whether busty or not. The bottom is a little short to tuck in completely so I rock it out with a little tuck behind my belt. I suggest hand-washing as it does pill after multiple washes and you want to keep the crisp colors. I cannot wait to buy more colorways for this solid seasonal piece! Read more
items.author: EmilyFB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and So Stylish
items.body: Love this top. It is comfortable, clean in design, and fits me well. Very happy and would absolutely buy another. This brand seems to all-around make great clothing. Read more
items.author: ALC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tight in the torso stomach area. Not my style.
items.body: This shirt appears to be waist thength and longer. It is not. It was very soft and very pretty. Unfortunately, I had to return. I waited on a long time for it to be shipped and then it was not long enough around my torso. It was also tight fitting and suppose to be loose. It just didn't work for me. I loved the sleeves. You can dress this shirt up or down. Read more
items.author: Manuela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Modern Staple
items.body: The Dokotoo Women's short puff sleeve knit top is a great workday essential. It's soft, comfortable, and stylish, with a modern, feminine touch from the puff sleeves. It pairs perfectly with slacks and is easy to care for since it washes well. The top is a versatile piece that combines comfort and professionalism. Read more
items.author: amber poe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: This lightweight blouse is very soft and comfortable It fits tru to size. I'm 5'1" and the length was perfect. Fit right at the waist. Looks great tucked in or not. Read more
items.author: Christina

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Y Apricot, Red Stripe, Z Pink, Y Black, Apricot Stripe, Blue Stripe, White Stripe, Z White, Y Beige, Y Off-white, Z Red, Rose Stripe, Green Stripe, Y Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
